item.description:
@rabbibecky @AbbyChavaStein Would it cheer you up if I were to point you to the debunking of a pro-Trump, pro-Covid piece they apparently ran today?

@rabbibecky @AbbyChavaStein This seems compelling though didn’t read the article nor do I follow the topic closely. https://t.co/KrHJZAZGvT

@rabbibecky @AbbyChavaStein But I do pay attention to how very Trumpy Tablet has been for some time now.
@StadiumMainSt @joshtpm It’s possible this is beyond the ability of lawyers to help.
item.source:markdown: @StadiumMainSt @joshtpm It’s possible this is beyond the ability of lawyers to help.

item.description: @protecttruth_ Which means the spin was most probably provided by his assigning editor since he’s new to the beat.
item.source:markdown: @protecttruth_ Which means the spin was most probably provided by his assigning editor since he’s new to the beat.

item.description: @hegerle @joshtpm @atrupar Could be contents of the 15 boxes described in detail on the warrant. e.g. “Top secret nuke codes” or 1/6 emails to DOD officials. But certainly not “personal correspondence kept as momentos.”
item.source:markdown: @hegerle @joshtpm @atrupar Could be contents of the 15 boxes described in detail on the warrant. e.g. “Top secret nuke codes” or 1/6 emails to DOD officials. But certainly not “personal correspondence kept as momentos.”

item.description: @BigBrain1234 @gregdesimone4 @ashtonpittman @rauchway @DougJBalloon Are we sure that Doug B. isn’t just an alt for Dean B.? Have we ever seen them in the same room at the same time?
item.source:markdown: @BigBrain1234 @gregdesimone4 @ashtonpittman @rauchway @DougJBalloon Are we sure that Doug B. isn’t just an alt for Dean B.? Have we ever seen them in the same room at the same time?

item.description:
How long will it take Google Search to figure out how to detect bad machine-generated spam rewrites of real sites? It's not a good sign that my fourth search result is that kind of spam. https://t.co/jypvSH7l30

Anyway, congrats to AI researchers for solving the long-standing problem of "Internet content is too good and there's not enough of it."

Oh, fun: I clicked the link and got a request to install a Chrome extension. Web 3.0 rocks!
item.source:markdown:
How long will it take Google Search to figure out how to detect bad machine-generated spam rewrites of real sites? It's not a good sign that my fourth search result is that kind of spam. https://t.co/jypvSH7l30
Anyway, congrats to AI researchers for solving the long-standing problem of "Internet content is too good and there's not enough of it."
Oh, fun: I clicked the link and got a request to install a Chrome extension. Web 3.0 rocks!

item.description:
@EladNehorai I mean, it’s not like the guy who repped Mr Mar-a-Lago after repping some alleged Colombo mafiosos is sitting in the Presidents Conference as the lay leader of a major American Zionist organization… oh, yeah.

@EladNehorai Or that the Presidents Conference is run by an unrepentant former staffer for a Republican group, one of whose lay leaders was tweeting apoplectic about a properly executed search warrant yesterday….
item.source:markdown:
@EladNehorai I mean, it’s not like the guy who repped Mr Mar-a-Lago after repping some alleged Colombo mafiosos is sitting in the Presidents Conference as the lay leader of a major American Zionist organization… oh, yeah.
@EladNehorai Or that the Presidents Conference is run by an unrepentant former staffer for a Republican group, one of whose lay leaders was tweeting apoplectic about a properly executed search warrant yesterday….

item.description: @AvBronstein Wondering if this was a “Christian” “friend”? And how this will play out Christian youth outreach in the years ahead.

item.description: @AvBronstein And he would defend to his death his right to imprison you for pointing it out.

item.description:
@kevinrsours @AkivaMCohen You’d think I would remember this, having watched several episodes of The Paper Chase back in the day.

@kevinrsours @AkivaMCohen “Twitter: More educational than public television.”
item.source:markdown:

item.description: @AkivaMCohen So if a Canadian sues an Italian for a tort in NY — that goes to NY state court? But if a New Yorker does, that goes to a federal court?
item.source:markdown: @AkivaMCohen So if a Canadian sues an Italian for a tort in NY — that goes to NY state court? But if a New Yorker does, that goes to a federal court?

item.description: @adam_philips @KurtBusiek As a current Bergen County NJ resident, happy to buy you a meal and give you a bed for the night next time you’re stuck in Lodi. And give you a lift back to Newark.
